fields.label: Tüüp
fields.englishDescription: Optional media to display above the question.
fields.description: Pilt või video, mida kuvatakse küsimuse juures (mittekohustuslik element).

semantics.label: Ülesande kirjeldus
semantics.englishDescription: Describe how the user should solve the task.
semantics.description: Kirjelda, kuidas kasutaja peaks ülesande lahendama.

fields.englishLabel: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.label: Määratle kohandatud tagasiside igale punktisumma vahemikule
fields.englishDescription: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!
fields.description: Kliki "Lisa vahemik" nupule vajalike vahemike lisamiseks. Näiteks: 0-20% halb tulemus, 21-91% keskmine tulemus, 91-100% suurepärane tulemus!

semantics.label: Käitumisseaded.
semantics.englishDescription: These options will let you control how the task behaves.
semantics.description: Nende valikutega saad määrata ülesande käitumise.

fields.label: Näita punktisumma tulemus
fields.englishDescription: Show points earned for each answer.

fields.label: TODO
fields.englishDescription: Enable to prevent score point deduction for wrong marked words (be careful: might be abused from users who simply mark all the words to get full score)

semantics.label: Õige vastuse tekst
semantics.englishDescription: Text used to indicate that an answer is correct

semantics.label: Vale vastuse tekst
semantics.englishDescription: Text used to indicate that an answer is incorrect

semantics.label: Täitmata vastuse tekst
semantics.englishDescription: Text used to indicate that an answer is missing

semantics.label: Näita lahendust kirjeldus
semantics.englishDefault: Task is updated to contain the solution.
semantics.default: Ülesanne on uuendatud ja sisaldab nüüd lahendust.
semantics.englishDescription: This text tells the user that the tasks has been updated with the solution.
semantics.description: See tekst teatab kasutajale, et ülesandele on lisatud lahendus.

semantics.englishLabel: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
semantics.label: Punktisumma riba tekstiline esitus tekstilugeri kasutajaile

semantics.englishLabel: Label for the full readable text for assistive technologies
semantics.label: Label for the full readable text for assistive technologies

semantics.englishLabel: Label for the text where words can be marked for assistive technologies
semantics.label: Label for the text where words can be marked for assistive technologies
semantics.englishDefault: Full text where words can be marked
semantics.default: Full text where words can be marked

semantics.englishLabel: Solution mode header for assistive technologies
semantics.label: Solution mode header for assistive technologies

semantics.englishLabel: Checking mode header for assistive technologies
semantics.label: Checking mode header for assistive technologies
Assistive technology description for "Check" button
semantics.englishDefault: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
semantics.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

semantics.englishLabel: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
semantics.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
semantics.englishDefault: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
semantics.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

semantics.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
semantics.englishDefault: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
semantics.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
